abilities.description: Your mech has aggressive viral coding allowing you to attempt controlling another mech. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} by controlling another mech, add +1. On a strong hit, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} +wits (one time) by directing the enemy mech to attack on your behalf.
